conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text: Considering your preference for a film primarily in Yiddish language, I recommend checking out 'A Serious Man' (2009). This acclaimed movie by director Ethan Coen features a strong Yiddish influence and tells the story of Larry Gopnik, a Midwestern physics teacher grappling with existential questions. The cast includes Peter Breitmayer, Fred Melamed, and Michael Stuhlbarg, who deliver nuanced performances in both English and Yiddish.
